div.p: Duration: These programs can be customized based on requirements and can be from 1 – 4 hours. Introduce Employees to the importance of managing stress, developing their emotional intelligence and and making healthier lifestyle through mindful and conscious living in order to achieve their highest potential.
These seminars and workshops are designed for all levels of management and are inspiring, lively and entertaining with plenty of opportunity for ands-on learning and interaction.
